functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: En dus, in die woorde van voormalige President Mandela, “[durf] ons nie talm nie, want ons lang pad is nog nie verby nie”.
functions.exampleen: And so, in the words of former President Mandela, “we dare not linger, for our long road is not yet over”.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: Toegang tot gesondheids- en onderwysgeriewe [het] verbeter.
functions.exampleen: Access to health and education facilities has improved.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: Deur saam te werk, [kan] ons meer bereik.
functions.exampleen: By working together, we can achieve more.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.exampleen: What expenses may be claimed?

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: Die Regering [moet] vinniger, harder en slimmer werk.
functions.exampleen: The Government must work faster, harder and smarter.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: Ons langtermyn-infrastruktuurprogram [sal] ons help om vinniger te groei.
functions.exampleen: Our long-term infrastructure program will help us grow faster.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: Laat ons altyd gereed [wees] om die polisie van inligting oor misdaadaktiwiteite te voorsien.
functions.exampleen: Let us always be ready to provide the police with information on criminal activities.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: Ons [wil] ook grondhervornming en landbou-ondersteuningsprogramme beter integreer.
functions.exampleen: We also want to better integrate land reform and agricultural support programs.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.example: Welvaart [word] geskep om mense se lewenskwaliteit te verbeter.
functions.exampleen: Wealth is created to improve people's quality of life.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: unknown

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: ب معنى آخر ان دور نا الاساسي هو العرض و [ليس] الانتقاد.
functions.exampleen: In another sense, our primary role is presentation, not criticism.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: My father is a blacksmith.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.example: мы маглі [б] працаваць разам з вамі
functions.exampleen: we could work with you

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.example: Вядома, такі праект быў [бы] немагчымы без падтрымкі нашых партнёраў: Аліварыя і Euroradio.
functions.exampleen: Of course, such a project would be impossible without the support of our partners: Olivaria and Euroradio.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: Пры гэтым сірыйскія прэпараты [будуць] даступныя ў беларускіх аптэках.
functions.exampleen: At the same time, Syrian drugs will be available in Belarusian pharmacies.

functions.rule: combination of a future form of the auxiliary and an infinitive of an imperfective main verb
functions.example: Пры чым гэтыя рэкамендацыі [будуць] тычыцца абодвух бакоў.
functions.exampleen: At what these recommendations will concern both parties.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a passive participle of a main verb
functions.exampleen: The revolt was brutally suppressed by the Soviet occupiers.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.deficient: pronominal copula may be used in the present tense
functions.example: Усе лекцыі напоўнены энерджайзерамі, з дапамогай якіх усе пазнаёмяцца паміж сабою, а кантакты ў наш час - [гэта] вельмі важна.
functions.exampleen: All lectures are filled with energizers, with which everyone will get to know each other, and contacts nowadays are very important.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.example: Парламентът в момента е много необективен и не [би] избрал добър президент.
functions.exampleen: Parliament is currently very biased and would not elect a good president.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a passive participle of the main verb
functions.example: Когато катализаторите се повредят - те просто [биват] сваляни.
functions.exampleen: When the catalysts are damaged, they are simply removed.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: Предполага се, че лятото ще [бъде] горещо.
functions.exampleen: Summer is supposed to be hot.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a passive participle of the main verb
functions.example: Книгата беше прочетена, преди да [бъде] купена.
functions.exampleen: The book was read before it was bought.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: Това [е] нашият общ интерес с България.
functions.exampleen: This is our common interest with Bulgaria.

functions.rule: combination of a finite form of the auxiliary and a past participle of a main verb
functions.example: При стареца [бе] останала Христина, хубавата му внучка.
functions.exampleen: Christina, his beautiful granddaughter, had stayed with the old man.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a passive participle of the main verb
functions.example: Книгата [беше] прочетена, преди да бъде купена.
functions.exampleen: The book was read before it was bought.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary with a present finite form of the main verb
functions.example: В събота разкъсана облачност [ще] има в Югозападна България.
functions.exampleen: On Saturday there will be scattered clouds in Southwestern Bulgaria.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: जरूरी ईहो बा कि जवन काम हो रहल [बा] ओकरा के कम से कम झंडावाला लोग जरूर पढ़सु ।

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: ϩⲱⲃ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲉⲧⲟⲩⲟⲛϩ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲉⲛⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓⲛ [ⲛⲉ] ·

functions.rule: combination of a conditional form of the auxiliary and past participle of a main verb

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: It's free.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.example: Rom [blev] ikke bygget på én dag.
functions.exampleen: Rome was not built in one day.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: I de kommende år [bør] det blive lettere at hæve kvalitetsniveauet på vore højere læreranstalter.
functions.exampleen: In the coming years, it should be easier to raise the quality level at our higher education institutions.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: Det [vil] hindre mange misforståelser mellem vore to partier.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: Bankkunden [mussten] mehrere Stunden anstehen, um Geld abzuheben.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: It's indescribable.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of a main verb
functions.example: Dank ihm [sind] unsere Rechtsstreitigkeiten positiv verlaufen.
functions.exampleen: Thanks to him, our litigation went well.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of a main verb

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: Wir [werden] die Sonnendüne als Geheimtipp handeln.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of a main verb
functions.example: So [wurden] die irakischen Panzer durch Kampfflugzeuge zerstört.

functions.rule: combination of a subjunctive form of the auxiliary and an infinitive of a main verb
functions.exampleen: I would not recommend it.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb

functions.rule: combination of a conditional form of the auxiliary and a past participle of a main verb

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a supine of the main verb
functions.exampleen: He has recommended torture.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: Í dag [má] sjá víðfeðmar rústir þar.
functions.exampleen: Today you can see extensive ruins there.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: Við [munum] meta hvort og hvernig við höldum áfram í næsta hluta.
functions.exampleen: We will evaluate whether and how we proceed in the next section.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: Þess í stað ákváðu þeir að Albanía [skyldi] vera undir yfirráðum Ottómana, en hafa sjálfstjórn.
functions.exampleen: Instead, they decided that Albania should be under Ottoman rule, but have autonomy.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: Kannski [voru] kröfur um klæðaburð of strangar.
functions.exampleen: Perhaps the dress code was too strict.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.example: Rússar tilkynntu að samningum [yrði] rift í byrjun október.
functions.exampleen: Russia announced that agreements would be terminated in early October.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.exampleen: The exercise is done five times.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.example: Le pale gli [hanno] tranciato le gambe.
functions.exampleen: The shovels have severed his legs.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: Che prezzo [dovrete] pagare a Zagabria per l'intervento?
functions.exampleen: What price will you have to pay in Zagreb for the surgery?

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: It's just a lot of confusion.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: Queste persone sfruttano i contadini, cioè li [fanno] lavorare molto e li pagano pochissimo.
functions.exampleen: These people exploit the peasants, that is, they make them work a lot and pay them very little.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.exampleen: How many passengers can a Boeing 747 carry?

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: Ma se uno insiste con questo ritornello, significa o che non [sa] leggere le cifre oppure non le [sa] vedere.
functions.exampleen: But if one insists on this refrain, it means either that he cannot read the figures or he cannot see them.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a present participle of the main verb
functions.exampleen: The police are investigating the incident.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.exampleen: When was the Titanic built?

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: [Vorrei] infine soffermar mi su un ultimo punto.
functions.exampleen: Finally, I would like to focus on one last point.

functions.rule: copula is suffixed on the non-verbal predicate
functions.exampleen: It's a strange story.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: -ing

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: I am the chief.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.deficient: used when the suffixed copula -e- cannot provide the corresponding form
functions.exampleen: The Eurovision Song Contest 2010 will be the 55th Eurovision Song Contest.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.deficient: suffixed copula can provide only some forms
functions.example: Халықтың үміті мен Сіздің сеніміңізді ақтай алғаныма қуанышты [мын].
functions.exampleen: I am glad that I was able to live up to the expectations of the people and your trust.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: It was the month of April.

functions.rule: copula is suffixed on the non-verbal predicate
functions.exampleen: The last 6 days was the third of the 24 seasons, Gyeong-chip.

functions.rule: existential-possessive negative copula present; negative auxiliary and main verb in evidential past
functions.exampleen: There is no one else in the village like him.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.deficient: Occurs in code-switching, not part of Komi system.
functions.exampleen: There were foxes, polar foxes, minks. (Sentence partially in Komi and Russian.)
functions.comment: Not a native copula for Komi, the exact method of annotation should be considered.

functions.rule: Habitual-distributional
functions.exampleen: During the festivals there have been demonstrations in the village.
functions.comment: example source: Челядьдырся азбука / Надежда Логинова // Войвыв кодзув (2015. No 3)

functions.rule: Habitual
functions.example: Менам татшӧм мича аканьыс некор на эз [вӧвлы]!
functions.exampleen: I haven't ever had that kind of beautiful doll.
functions.comment: example source: Мисьтӧм акань, Кирпиченко Т., Би кинь (2013. No1)

functions.rule: copula past and existential-possessive past
functions.exampleen: I had fun here...
functions.comment: example source: komicorpora.ru, Viktoria Mixajlova, Jölöga

functions.rule: NEEDS TO BE REMOVED FROM AUX LIST
functions.deficient: NEEDS TO BE REMOVED FROM AUX LIST
functions.example: NEEDS TO BE [REMOVED] FROM AUX LIST
functions.exampleen: NEEDS TO BE REMOVED FROM AUX LIST
functions.comment: NEEDS TO BE REMOVED FROM AUX LIST

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and main verb in evidetial past
functions.exampleen: They will be changed for a mining furnace.

functions.rule: Present tense
functions.example: Ӧти пу вылас [овлывлӧ] дас кык позйӧдз да унджык.
functions.exampleen: There are as many as 12 or even more nests per tree.
functions.comment: example source: Сьӧд рака / Ракин А. // Би кинь (2007. No 9)

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and the main verb in connegative form
functions.exampleen: They don't know fair play.
functions.comment: example source: komicorpora.ru, Selivanova, A. Bi kinj

functions.rule: existential-possessive copula present
functions.exampleen: – Do you have some time to spare, Sasha?
functions.comment: example source: komicorpora.ru, Kodko, Vojvyv Kodzuv.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: — There is still a little water in the teapot.
functions.comment: Вежон кежлӧ том кадӧ / Петр Шахов // Войвыв кодзув (1971. No 7)

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: It will be bright tomorrow.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: Reports were less than the truth.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: I was a doctor.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: Because he did not want the girl to be embarrassed.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: Klasifikacija visuomet [yra] labai reliatyvus ir ginčytinas dalykas.
functions.exampleen: Classification is always a very relative and controversial thing.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: It is my hen.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: Jo pilsētā naudas nekad nevar [būt] par daudz.
functions.exampleen: Because in the city money can never be too much.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: 季任 is a place guard of country 任

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: The snake is dead!

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: Was the papal dispensation enough?

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.deficient: used with locative and nominal predicates
functions.exampleen: Horses are in the forest.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: Honey is sweet.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.deficient: changes the tense of the main verb
functions.exampleen: he [went] hunting

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: There is sweet-potatoe in mother's house

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.deficient: used to change the tense of a verb
functions.exampleen: He always used to go
functions.comment: May also be used with possessed nouns (i.e. stative verbs)

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary in conjunctive and the main verb in connegative form
functions.exampleen: But I never would have started to talk...

functions.rule: existential-possessive negative copula present and past
functions.deficient: used in indicative present and past only
functions.exampleen: It is a good thing you weren't at home.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary with main finite verb in conjunctive mood or infinitive
functions.example: Мон а муян валт, кода [бу] ёвтамс...
functions.exampleen: I can't find words, how should it be said...

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and the main verb in connegative form
functions.deficient: used in negative imperative and optative
functions.example: Сонсь пистьс-килькшс эци, ансяк [иля] нузялдо, витнек тувортнэнь.
functions.exampleen: They are just pushing to get into the snares, all you have to do is to keep your traps set.

functions.rule: mainly foreign element, used in main and subordinate clauses
functions.example: Виде [ли] кияк косояк мезтькак а тейни?..
functions.exampleen: Is it true that nobody is doing anything anywhere?

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and main verb
functions.example: Миненек [савкшны] аволь ансяк ловномс, сави тонавтнемс сёрмадомо.
functions.exampleen: Not only do we have to read, we have to learn to write as well.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and main verb with obl agent
functions.exampleen: This year, even Morgo had to go along.

functions.rule: copula future and emphatic present
functions.deficient: used in future and emphatic present only
functions.exampleen: He would like to play, but now ...

functions.rule: copula past and existential-possessive past free morpheme
functions.exampleen: You were president then.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary in past and progressive-habitual past with main verb in connegative form
functions.deficient: indicative past and progressive-habitual past only
functions.example: Чокшнень перть [эзть] валгоне кельбрясто неть валтнэ.
functions.exampleen: All evening long those words did not leave the tip of his tongue.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and main verb
functions.exampleen: It takes a lot of skill to prepare the forms!

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.exampleen: I did what I could.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: Niemand anders dan Bin Laden [kan] dat gedaan hebben.
functions.exampleen: No one but bin Laden could have done that.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: Ook in de Tour [moet] dat tot successen leiden.
functions.exampleen: This should also lead to success in the Tour.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.exampleen: You can eat as much as you want.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.exampleen: The train is missed by Arie.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: That's a category.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.exampleen: When will China take over Hong Kong?

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.example: Forslag om dette vil [bli] fremmet før jul.
functions.exampleen: Suggestions about this will be submitted before Christmas.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: Privat kapital og kompetanse [bør] også bidra.
functions.exampleen: Private capital and expertise should also contribute.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.exampleen: It must last, I think.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.example: Jeg [har] gitt fedre omsorgen i enkelte saker.
functions.exampleen: I have cared for fathers in some cases.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: Da [kan] du gjøre virkelig store kupp.
functions.exampleen: Then you can make really big bargains.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: Derfor [må] vi gjennomføre en etter- og videreutdanningsreform.
functions.exampleen: Therefore, we must implement a continuing and further education reform.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: Vi [skal] ha gode velferdsordninger som gir trygghet.
functions.exampleen: We must have good welfare schemes that provide security.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: Etter det [torde] eg ikkje ta fleire slike initiativ.
functions.exampleen: After that, I did not dare to take more such initiatives.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.exampleen: Why do we not dare to discuss this?

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: Mi oppgåve [er] å verna om rettane til born.
functions.exampleen: My task is to protect the rights of children.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.example: Som døme [vart] nemnt tilhøvet mellom morsmål og nasjonalspråk.
functions.exampleen: As an example, the connection between mother tongue and national language was mentioned.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.exampleen: Do you think Greece will do this?

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: Sponsorpenger [vil] gjøre kunstlivet mer uavhengig og autonomt.
functions.exampleen: Sponsorship money will make art life more independent and autonomous.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: Thomassen [er] på vei til sin neste gjerning.
functions.exampleen: Thomassen is on his way to his next deed.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a present participle of the main verb
functions.exampleen: I am getting dressed.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: Tämä [on] kirjaine Peteras da se tuodih egläi.
functions.exampleen: This letter is from Peter and it was delivered yesterday.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.example: А за лошадьми [б] тебе самому ехать.
functions.exampleen: And you would have to go to the horses alone.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.example: А жены [бы] ваши имели покровены главы.
functions.exampleen: And your wives would have their heads covered.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: it is an Indian city

functions.rule: combination of a future form of the auxiliary and an infinitive of an imperfective main verb
functions.example: Здеся, г., на Плушкине сенных покосав деловым [будет] чистить завтра в пятницу на день.
functions.exampleen: Here, Mr., on Plushkin hay mowing business will clean tomorrow on Friday for a day.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a passive participle of a main verb
functions.example: Дан [был] мне холопу твоему за пристава немчин Петр Фальк в убивственном деле.
functions.exampleen: A German Peter Falk was given to me, your servant, as the bailiff in the murder case.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: Ah what is the problem?

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.exampleen: I'd love to talk to him.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: He hasn't been gentle lately.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: Suddenly everything was clear.

functions.rule: combination of a present indicative form of the auxiliary and a past participle of a main verb
functions.exampleen: I started to drown.

functions.rule: combination of a future form of the auxiliary and an infinitive of an imperfective main verb
functions.example: Jak my [będziemy] wyglądać w ich wieku?
functions.exampleen: What will we look like at their age?

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a passive participle of a main verb
functions.exampleen: This data will be strictly protected.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a present indicative form of the main verb
functions.exampleen: And let them excommunicate me.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a present indicative form of the main verb
functions.exampleen: Let me see this nut.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a present indicative form of the main verb
functions.example: [Niechby] się już wyniósł stąd, a zrobiło by się dobrze jak po wyrwaniu chorego zęba.
functions.exampleen: Let him get out of here already, and it would be fine as if a sick tooth had been extracted.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a present indicative form of the main verb
functions.example: Jeśli ktoś ma jakiekolwiek jej wiersze, lub choćby wie gdzie ich szukać: błagam, [niechże] da znać paollo@free.poltronic.net będę wdzięczny do grobowej deski - jest to dla mnie bardzo ważna sprawa, proszę...
functions.exampleen: If anyone has any of her poems, or even knows where to look for them: please let me know paollo@free.poltronic.net I will be grateful to the death - it is a very important matter for me, please ...

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.deficient: pronominal copula may be used in the present tense instead of or in addition to the verbal copula
functions.exampleen: Is a mosquito a mammal?
functions.comment: The word is etymologically a pronoun but the Polish LFG team insists that in its copula usage, the word lends the clause the present tense and should thus be tagged AUX.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a passive participle of the main verb
functions.exampleen: Everyone is immediately summoned to Moscow.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a passive participle of the main verb
functions.exampleen: The teacher was detained.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: She is beautiful.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: He was a king.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: Os portugueses [estão] em forma em o surf.
functions.exampleen: The Portuguese are in shape in the surf.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: Um de eles [era] seu filho, Sérgio Fioravanti.
functions.exampleen: One of them was his son, Sérgio Fioravanti.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.example: Várias soluções [têm] sido propostas para contornar este obstáculo.
functions.exampleen: Several solutions have been proposed to overcome this obstacle.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: İlla hani şimdi this [is] my pencil falan diye şeyler değil de daha çok so ich glaube so Fachbegriffe jetzt was sich hier drauf bezieht.
functions.exampleen: Not necessarily now this is my pencil stuff, but rather so I think so technical terms now what refers to it here.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: Evet birbirimize nasıl destek çıktık mesela Mathe falan da gönderiyorduk hep sizin Übung bizden önce[ydi] hep.
functions.exampleen: Yes, how did we support each other? For example, we were sending Mathe or something. Your exercise was always before us.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.deficient: Turkish copula used in cases where the suffixed copula does not have the corresponding form
functions.example: Und ich glaube da ist es ja schon bisschen anstrengender yapmadım ben de ama çok pişman [oldum].
functions.exampleen: And I think it's a bit more strenuous but I regretted it very much.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: Die Sache [ist] eh die eine Seite, diese Kadıköy Acil, die sagen so:
functions.exampleen: The thing is always one side, these Kadıköy Acil, they say like this:

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.exampleen: The mayor, the guard, the whole village came.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: Riscul cel mai mare [este] moartea prin asfixiere.
functions.exampleen: The greatest risk is death by suffocation.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.exampleen: The first internship will be completed in 2007.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.exampleen: It wouldn't be so offensive

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.example: Я [бы] сказал так: хотеть не вредно.
functions.exampleen: I would say this: wanting is not harmful.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: But not everyone should be the boss.

functions.rule: combination of a future form of the auxiliary and an infinitive of an imperfective main verb
functions.example: Все также [будут] обрушиваться на землю водопады.
functions.exampleen: All waterfalls will also fall on the ground.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a passive participle of a main verb
functions.exampleen: Algorism was invented in Greece.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: А единый государственный экзамен - [это] разве не новация?
functions.exampleen: And the unified state exam is not an innovation?

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: There is a city called Mahilaropya in the southern country.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: uktaḥ [bhavati] yaḥ pūrvam guṇavān saṁsadi na tasya vācyam nairguṇyam pratijñābhaṅgabhīruṇā.
functions.exampleen: If one is afraid to brake a promise, he must not tell at the court the mediocrity of the one who he previously said to be endowed with qualities.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: There is a city called Mahilaropya in the southern country.
functions.comment: asti dākṣiṇātye janapade mahilāropyaṁ nāma nagaram.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: उक्तः [भवति] यः पूर्वम् गुणवान् संसदि न तस्य वाच्यम् नैर्गुण्यम् प्रतिज्ञाभङ्गभीरुणा।
functions.exampleen: If one is afraid to brake a promise, he must not tell at the court the mediocrity of the one who he previously said to be endowed with qualities.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary, optionally the present auxiliary, and a past participle of the main verb
functions.example: Chcel [by] som s tebou prebrať istú myšlienku.
functions.exampleen: I would like to discuss an idea with you.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: The house is really surrounded.

functions.rule: combination of a present indicative form of the auxiliary and a past participle of a main verb
functions.exampleen: I stopped.

functions.rule: combination of a future form of the auxiliary and an infinitive of an imperfective main verb
functions.example: Kimov neoficiálny čínsky výlet tentoraz zrejme prelom znamenať [nebude].
functions.exampleen: Kim's unofficial Chinese trip will probably not be a turning point this time.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a passive participle of a main verb
functions.example: Bajraktar Mustafa Paša [bol] menovaný za veľkovezíra.
functions.exampleen: Bajraktar Mustafa Pasha was appointed Grand Vizier.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: The consequences of the impact used to be just as severe.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: The beginning was almost fabulous.

functions.rule: combination of a present indicative form of the auxiliary and a past participle of a main verb
functions.example: Za to pomoč [smo] jim seveda tudi plačali.
functions.exampleen: Of course, we also paid them for this help.

functions.rule: combination of a future form of the auxiliary and an infinitive of an imperfective main verb
functions.exampleen: What will be the results?

functions.rule: combination of a conditional form of the auxiliary and a past participle of a main verb
functions.example: O njemu [bi] morali govoriti takrat aprila leta 1995.
functions.exampleen: We should have talked about it then in April 1995.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: to be added

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and main verb in infinitive
functions.example: Na teʹl âʹtte čiččâm eeʹjj [feʹrttji] leeʹd säldten ja vasta puätt mååust.
functions.exampleen: But back then you had to be a soldier for seven years and only then come back.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and main verb obl:agent with transitive verbs
functions.example: Čääʹʒʒid di muõrid di puk poʹhtte, vuäʹbbes [i-ǥõl] ni koʹst jååʹtted.
functions.exampleen: They brought water and wood and everything, his sister was not allowed to go anywhere.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and main verb in connegative form.
functions.example: Tõt ooumaž ceälkk, jos [ij] täätt puk väʹldded...
functions.exampleen: That person says, if he does not want to take all...

functions.rule: negative copula
functions.example: Seeʹst [jeäʹla] ǩeeʹrjteeʹjest võl ni måkam jurddi.
functions.exampleen: They have no idea who wrote it.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and main verb.
functions.exampleen: That service time was twenty-five years.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and main verb
functions.example: Suʹst leäi [õlggâm] leeʹd tõn peeiʹv čååǥǥâʹttmen vuõptees,..
functions.exampleen: She should have been having her hair combed the day...

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: Ishulli i Manit s'[është] pjesë e Bashkimit Evropian.
functions.exampleen: The Isle of Man is not part of the European Union.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.example: Format e emërimit të qytetit [kanë] ndryshuar gjatë shekujve.
functions.exampleen: The forms of naming the city have changed over the centuries.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a gerund of the main verb
functions.example: Qytetet [u] shndërruan në shtete të qytetit dhe shtete kombëtare.
functions.exampleen: Cities became city-states and nation-states.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: Esat Berisha is one such example.

functions.rule: combination of a present indicative form of the auxiliary and a past participle of a main verb
functions.exampleen: The organizers refused.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a passive participle of the main verb
functions.exampleen: So many workers have been laid off.

functions.rule: combination of a conditional form of the auxiliary and a past participle of a main verb
functions.example: Trebalo [bi] da spreči mogućnost političkog haosa.
functions.exampleen: It should prevent the possibility of political chaos.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.exampleen: This will not be the first renovation of Galeb.

functions.rule: Combines with the supine form of the main verb to form perfect and pluperfect.
functions.exampleen: she [has] done it

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: En huvudtes i kibbutzideologin [är] fullständig jämställdhet mellan könen.
functions.exampleen: One of the main themes in the kibbutz ideology is complete equality between the sexes.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: பன்னாட்டு தொழில் நிறுவனங்களில் தொழிற்சங்க உரிமைகள் மறுக்கப்[படுகின்றன].
functions.exampleen: Trade union rights are denied in multinational corporations.

functions.rule: follows the infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: இது போன்ற வதந்திகளுக்கு ஆக தான் பெரிதும் கவலைப்படப் [போவதி]ல்லை
functions.exampleen: I'm not going to worry too much about rumors like this

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: இந்தப் பயணத்தின் போது அவர் பாகிஸ்தானுக்குச் செல்ல [மாட்டார்] என்று வெள்ளை மாளிகை செய்திக்குறிப்பு தெரிவிக்கிறது.
functions.exampleen: The White House said in a statement that he would not go to Pakistan during the trip.
functions.comment: for negative future tense with human subject

functions.rule: follows the infinitive of the main verb
functions.example: இவர்களுக்க் ஆன கட்சி என்று காங்கிரசுக்கு முத்திரை குத்த [முடியாது] என்றார் ராகுல்.
functions.exampleen: Rahul said the Congress could not be branded as a party for them.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: ஆளும் ஐக்கிய ஜனதாதளம் - பாஜக கூட்டணிய் ஆனால் உம் சரி அல்லது ராஷ்ட்ரீய ஜனதாதளம் - லோக் ஜனசக்தி கூட்டணிய் ஆனால் உம் சரி இவை இரண்ட் உம் ஏ மத, ஜாதி அரசியலை முன்னிறுத்தி அரசியல் லாபம் அடைய [முயல்கின்றன].
functions.exampleen: The ruling United Janata Dal-BJP alliance is either yours or the Rashtriya Janata Dal-Lok Janashakthi alliance but you are both seeking political gain by projecting religious and caste politics.

functions.rule: follows the infinitive of the main verb
functions.exampleen: Both must be of marriageable age.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a participle of the main verb
functions.example: சாகும் வரை சிறையில் ஏயே அடைத்து [வைத்தால்] உம்
functions.exampleen: If you are imprisoned until death

functions.rule: the auxiliary precedes the main verb
functions.exampleen: Don't leave.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.deficient: suffixed copula can provide only some forms
functions.example: Bu hayvanların arasında en vahşisi kaplan[mış].
functions.exampleen: The wildest of these animals was the tiger.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.deficient: used when the suffixed copula i- cannot provide the corresponding form
functions.exampleen: I didn't know everyone was here.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.deficient: suffixed copula can provide only some forms
functions.exampleen: Our house was next door to Ara.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.deficient: used when the suffixed copula cannot provide the corresponding form
functions.exampleen: Our house was next door to Ara.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.example: Коли [б] я не прийшла надвечір, занесеш веприкові.
functions.exampleen: If I don't come in the evening, you'll bring it to the boar.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.example: А що було [би] якби не було туманностей, зірок, галактик.
functions.exampleen: And what would happen if there were no nebulae, stars, galaxies.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: The leg is usually a barely noticeable ring.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: Різання [є] одним з найпоширеніших способів механічної обробки конструкційних матеріалів.
functions.exampleen: Cutting is one of the most common methods of machining structural materials.

functions.rule: combination of a future form of the auxiliary and an infinitive of an imperfective main verb
functions.exampleen: You will work underground.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a passive participle of a main verb
functions.example: 1946 року вперше [було] отримано ультрафіолетовий спектр Сонця.
functions.exampleen: In 1946, the ultraviolet spectrum of the Sun was obtained for the first time.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: His father was very rich.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: شکیل اور پروین بیگم کی حالت تشویشناک [ہے]۔
functions.exampleen: The condition of Shakeel and Parveen Begum is critical.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: Đó [là] cuộc chiến tranh phi nghĩa.
functions.exampleen: It is a senseless war.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
functions.exampleen: The small child is chasing the dog.

functions.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
functions.example: Wante su ne woon ci nasaaran “j'[avais] dit, mais maintenant je me dédis”, mbir mi du deme noonu!
functions.exampleen: I said but now I dedicate myself.
functions.comment: French auxiliary avoir contained in some foreign material

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.example: Mu mujj nag [di] nguur gu dëgër.
functions.exampleen: unknown

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: unknown

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.deficient: used in presentative or progressive constructions
functions.exampleen: unknown

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.deficient: French copula occurs in French foreign material
functions.example: Kon soo ko seetee, làkki jambuur wi ñu fi saxal ab jumtukaay la itam bu ñuy noote ak a naaxale askan wi, maanaan “c'[est] un instrument de domination et d'infantilasation aussi du peuple”!
functions.exampleen: “it is also an instrument of domination and infantilization of the people”!

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: And the evening and the morning were the third day.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: And God called the firmament Heaven.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.deficient: this form is used in colloquial Cantonese
functions.example: 剩落呢啲都[係]冇用㗎喇！
functions.exampleen: The rest are all unusable!
functions.comment: See https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/docs/issues/653 for a discussion about Chinese copulas.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.deficient: in Cantonese, this form is used only in the high-standard variety, not in colloquial speech
functions.example: 剩落呢啲都[係]冇用㗎喇！
functions.exampleen: The rest are all unusable!
functions.comment: See https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/docs/issues/653 for a discussion about Chinese copulas.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.deficient: wei and shi should be interchangeable, this is the simplified character for wei
functions.example: 最近的公交车站[为]九三五厂站。
functions.exampleen: The nearest bus station is 935 Station.
functions.comment: See https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/docs/issues/653 for a discussion about Chinese copulas.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.deficient: shi and wei should be interchangeable
functions.example: 南京官話曾經長期[是]中國的官方語言。
functions.exampleen: Nanjing Mandarin has long been the official language of China.
functions.comment: See https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/docs/issues/653 for a discussion about Chinese copulas.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.deficient: wei and shi should be interchangeable, this is the traditional character for wei
functions.example: 最近的公交車站[為]九三五廠站。
functions.exampleen: The nearest bus station is 935 Station.
functions.comment: See https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/docs/issues/653 for a discussion about Chinese copulas.

functions.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
functions.exampleen: I was cold.
